name: Maze Royale
description:
~ THE ONLY ONE-FINGER BATTLE ROYALE ON MOBILE ~

1 map, up to 60 players and 1 rule: being the last survivor!

Quickly collect the red gems on the map to enter a fury mode and kill your enemies!

No mercy, you must kill to survive and be careful, the map shrinks as time passes do not get trapped.

Collect coins and buy new skins in the shop.

Simplified controls: swipe your finger in the direction you want to move.

Will you be up to it?
